message.content: This question requires some basic knowledge about bear behavior and habitat. Therefore, a person wanting to find a live bear in a forest will have difficulty because bears naturally avoid humanity. Option (B) is incorrect because bears are not domesticated animals. Option (D) is incorrect because while bears can have camouflage fur, it is not the primary reason why it is difficult to find them in a forest.
